tool_description: The simplest way to remove image backgrounds through API
name: Background removal
title: Background removal

api_list.name: Upload File
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to remove background from file uploaded. The response would be in base64 formate. You can goto this website and paste the base64 string to get the image https://codebeautify.org/base64-to-image-converter. Or else one can do it programmatically.

utterances.utterance: Remove the background from this image file.
Can you process this photo to remove its background?
I need the background removed from this picture.
Please remove the background from this uploaded image.
Extract the foreground from this file by removing the background.
Process this file to eliminate the background.
Remove the background from this image and return the result.
Can you remove the background from this photograph?
I want the background removed from this image file.
Please process this file to remove its background.
